Reviews.Title: This is for XP
Reviews.Author: azwildbill
Reviews.Content: No where in the ad does it say what operating system it is made for and after purchasing the box states XP . This might be a new product but drivers have not been updated. There is no website available. I will have to install dual boot xp in order to test product.Note: This product and similar products are all made in china and have similar issues with not being Win 7 Compatible. Be careful and ask OS before purchase. I have been looking for a work around but have not found one.
